page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: ACTIVITIES In addition to the curriculum of the school,various other activities take place.There is an inter-school swimming gala,inter-school sports,an annual concert and annual outings during the summer term just to name a few.There is a P.T.F.A.which organise various fund-raising events.Some of the pupils attend a recorder festival every year,the boys take part in a football tournament and as it is a church school all children at some stage attend a church schools festival at Lincoln Cathedral.There they join up with pupils from other church schools and take part in various activities.Atthe end of the day they are presented with a memento of their day.
